title: CY50111: Heterocycles In Medicines - Quick Facts
text:
CY50111
Course name | Heterocycles In Medicines
Offered by | Chemistry
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: NilOverview of chemistry aromatic Heterocycles and fused Heterocycles, porphyrins and flavones. Heterocycles in the pharmaceutical industry: Antibacterial agents viz. Penicillins, Cephalosporins, novel betalactam antibiotics, Antifungal drugs viz. Pyridotriazine,Calcium Channel blockers viz Nifedipine and Amlodipine, Potasium channel opening vasodilator viz. pinacidil, Antiinflammatory agents viz. Piroxicam, selective inhibitor of type 5PDE viz. SildenafilBooks: J.A. Joule and K.Mills, Heterocyclic Chemistry; Graham L. Patrick, An Introduction to Medicinal Chemistry.
